GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
ksmbd: fix memory leak in smb2_handle_negotiate

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit ff20f1875889dbe4a67c9298e609d7c88cf6456d, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit e2f34481b24db2fd634b5edb0a5bd0e4d38cc6e9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ksmbd: fix memory leak in smb2_handle_negotiate
